p: OM true digestibility = [cellulose (mg OM) − undigested cellulose (mg OM)] × 100 ÷ cellulose (mg OM) (2) Microbial OM production was calculated by subtracting the mass of undigested cellulose OM from the total mass of the undigested solid residue OM: Microbial biomass (mg OM) = undigested solid residue (mg OM) − undigested cellulose (mg OM) (3)
